Interface EvaluationStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatBotGeneratorStrategy, ChatBotPlatformStrategy, ChatBotSimulationStrategy, ChatBotStrategy
public interface EvaluationStrategy
Defines a strategy for evaluating classes through test execution and feedback generation.

This interface provides a flexible mechanism for evaluating classes with a set of tests and storing feedback and results. Implementations can define custom evaluation logic while adhering to this contract.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • evaluate

      void evaluate(Class<?> clazz, Map<String,Integer> tests, Map<String,String> feedback)
      Evaluates the specified class using the provided tests and stores feedback.

      This method performs the evaluation of the class, executing the given tests and generating feedback. Results of the evaluation are stored internally and can be retrieved using getFeedback() and getTests().

      Parameters:
      clazz - the class to be evaluated, represented as a Class object. Must not be null.
      tests - a map of test names to their scores, where keys are test identifiers (non-null, non-empty strings) and values are integers representing scores. This map can be modified during the evaluation process.
      feedback - a map to store feedback messages, where keys are test identifiers (non-null, non-empty strings) and values are descriptive feedback messages. This map can be modified during the evaluation process.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if clazz is null or if invalid test or feedback data is provided.

    • getFeedback

      Map<String,String> getFeedback()
      Retrieves feedback generated during the evaluation process.

      This method returns a map of feedback messages generated for the evaluated class. Each entry corresponds to a specific test, with the key being the test identifier and the value being the feedback message.

      Returns:
      a map of test identifiers to feedback messages. May return an empty map if no feedback is available.

    • getTests

      Map<String,Integer> getTests()
      Retrieves the test results generated during the evaluation process.

      This method returns a map of test identifiers to their scores. The results reflect the state after the evaluation has been performed.

      Returns:
      a map of test identifiers to integer scores. May return an empty map if no tests were executed.
